item.title: Hogarth After Hours – A Rushed Masterpiece
item.author: Evlyn Forsyth-Muris,
item.description: 4 stars On a cold and slightly wet October Friday night, I made my way to the Sir John Soane Museum in Holborn. Located in the late John Soane’s house, the museum is a rabbit warren of impressively decorated rooms and secret cupboards; mirrors, artwork and sculpture line every wall and surface. Look …
